vocabTerms.description: When you summon this, it gets its allegiance bonus if the top card of your deck matches its region.
vocabTerms.name: Allegiance

vocabTerms.description: Automatically equips this item from hand or play when summoned, creating it first if needed.
vocabTerms.name: Auto-Equip

vocabTerms.description: Pick the next Moon Weapon for Aphelios.
vocabTerms.name: Phase

vocabTerms.description: Create a random Blade Fragment still needed to restore the blade. Once youâ€™ve played all 3, create the Blade of the Exile.
vocabTerms.name: Reforge

vocabTerms.description: Immediately draw 1 of each Ascended ally. For the rest of the game, level 2 Ascended allies are level 3.
vocabTerms.name: Restore the Sun Disc

vocabTerms.description: Effect when unit strikes with an attack
vocabTerms.name: Attack Strike

vocabTerms.description:
For each Spawn:
Summon a 1|1 Tentacle, or if you already have one, grant your strongest Tentacle +1|+1.
vocabTerms.name: Spawn

vocabTerms.description: Highest Power, with ties broken by highest Health then highest Cost.
vocabTerms.name: Strongest

vocabTerms.description: Obliterate X non-champion cards from the bottom of your deck.
vocabTerms.name: Toss

vocabTerms.description: Start a free attack with that many summoned Blades.
vocabTerms.name: Blade Dance

vocabTerms.description: You behold something if you have it in play or hand.
vocabTerms.name: Behold

vocabTerms.description: This is how much Mana you need to spend to play this card.
vocabTerms.name: Cost

vocabTerms.description: Get this effect when the round ends.
vocabTerms.name: Round End

vocabTerms.description: Completely removed from the game. Doesn't cause Last Breath and can't be revived.
vocabTerms.name: Obliterate

vocabTerms.description: This is how much damage the unit can withstand. If it reaches zero, the unit dies.
vocabTerms.name: Health

vocabTerms.description: Choose one of two random options from a depleting pool of equipment and equip it to this ally. If the ally wasn't played from hand, it equips a random equipment instead.
vocabTerms.name: Improvise

vocabTerms.description: This is how much damage the unit deals when it strikes.
vocabTerms.name: Power

vocabTerms.description: A card activates its Flow on Round Start if you played 2+ spells or skills last round.
vocabTerms.name: Flow

vocabTerms.description: Get this effect when this unit attacks.
vocabTerms.name: Attack

vocabTerms.description: A unit is buffed when its Power or Health is increased or it gains a new keyword.
vocabTerms.name: Buffed

vocabTerms.description: This champion counts as one of your deck's regions. During deckbuilding, you may add the specified cards to your deck regardless of region. Origins may also have an effect that begins at Start of Game.
vocabTerms.name: Origin

vocabTerms.description: Get this effect when a unit attempts to deal damage using its Power, either at the end of battle or with spells. Units with 0 Power can't strike.
vocabTerms.name: Strike

vocabTerms.description: Effect when unit Strikes the enemy Nexus.
vocabTerms.name: Nexus Strike

vocabTerms.description: A unit has its Empowered bonus while its Power is at least the listed number.
vocabTerms.name: Empowered

vocabTerms.description: Activates if allies have struck for 5+ damage at least 4 times this game.
vocabTerms.name: Reputation

vocabTerms.description: Equipping an Item to a unit grants it the listed bonuses. If the unit leaves play, the Item will return to your hand. You may play each item at most once per round.
vocabTerms.name: Equip

vocabTerms.description: Get this effect when the round starts.
vocabTerms.name: Round Start

vocabTerms.description: The opponent in The Path of Champions.
vocabTerms.name: Foe

vocabTerms.description: Grant an ally +1|+1. If the ally is equipped, grant it to their item instead.
vocabTerms.name: Forge

vocabTerms.description: Get this effect when you play this unit from hand.
vocabTerms.name: Play

vocabTerms.description: In play, in hand, in deck, in discard, and even if created/summoned later.
vocabTerms.name: Everywhere

vocabTerms.description: Makes a Countdown landmark count down that many times
vocabTerms.name: Advance

vocabTerms.description: Round Start: I count down 1. At 0, activate the Countdown effect, then destroy me.
vocabTerms.name: Countdown

vocabTerms.description: If you don't have one, gain the attack token. You can attack this round.
vocabTerms.name: Rally

vocabTerms.description: When you kill a unit via damage, kill effect, or striking it with an ally. (Self-killing, like from Ephemeral, doesn't count.)
vocabTerms.name: Slay

vocabTerms.description: Remove all keywords, abilities, and ongoing effects. Doesn't affect damage or subtype.
vocabTerms.name: Silence

vocabTerms.description: Create in hand 1 of 3 randomly selected cards.
vocabTerms.name: Manifest

vocabTerms.description: Transform allies Equipped with Darkin Equipment into their Darkin unit forms. If they are Champions, they Level Up.
vocabTerms.name: Assimilate

vocabTerms.description: Pick a card from among 3 in your deck. Shuffle the deck and put that card on top.
vocabTerms.name: Predict

keywords.description: Inflicts damage beyond what would kill the target(s) to the enemy Nexus.
keywords.name: Overwhelm

keywords.description: Can be played whenever you may act. Happens instantly and allows you to continue to play other cards.
keywords.name: Burst

keywords.description: Round Start: I count down 1. At 0, activate the Countdown effect, then destroy me.
keywords.name: Countdown

keywords.description: Get this effect when you play this unit from hand.
keywords.name: Play

keywords.description: Landmarks take up a space on the board. They can't attack, block, or take damage.
keywords.name: Landmark

keywords.description: A Captured card is removed from the game. It returns when the Capturing unit leaves play.
keywords.name: Capture

keywords.description: Get this effect when this unit attacks.
keywords.name: Attack

keywords.description: Attach me to an ally to give it my stats and keywords while I'm attached. When that ally leaves play, Recall me.
keywords.name: Attach

keywords.description: Fleeting cards discard from hand when the round ends.
keywords.name: Fleeting

keywords.description: Missing Translation
keywords.name: Missing Translation

keywords.description: Draw a non-champion card from the bottom of the enemy deck.
keywords.name: Nab

keywords.description: Can be played outside combat or when no other spells or skills are pending. Happens instantly and allows you to continue to play other cards.
keywords.name: Focus

keywords.description: You're Enlightened when you have 10 max mana.
keywords.name: Enlightened

keywords.description: Pick a Celestial card from among 3 to create in hand.
keywords.name: Invoke

keywords.description: A card activates its Flow on Round Start if you played 2+ spells or skills last round.
keywords.name: Flow

keywords.description: Attaches to another card in a deck. When that card is drawn, activate the effect.
keywords.name: Boon

keywords.description: Attaches to another card in a deck. When that card is drawn, activate the effect.
keywords.name: Trap

keywords.description: Heal your Nexus for the amount of damage dealt
keywords.name: Drain

keywords.description: These abilities take effect when the unit dies.
keywords.name: Last Breath

keywords.description: A champion in play levels up everywhere once this condition is met. Some champions must be in play to see their condition progress.
keywords.name: Level Up

keywords.description: Can be played whenever you may act. Happens after your opponent has a chance to react.
keywords.name: Fast

keywords.description: Return a unit to hand and remove all effects applied to it.
keywords.name: Recall

keywords.description: Lowest Power, with ties broken by lowest Health then lowest Cost
keywords.name: Weakest

keywords.description: Attacking with a support unit will buff the unit to its right.
keywords.name: Support

keywords.description: Can be played outside of combat when no spells or skills are pending. Happens after your opponent has a chance to react.
keywords.name: Slow

keywords.description: These abilities trigger when you resolve a spell.
keywords.name: Imbue

keywords.description: Missing Translation
keywords.name: Missing Translation

keywords.description: Equip to a unit to grant the listed bonuses. If the unit leaves play, the equipment will return to your hand. You may play each equipment at most once per round.
keywords.name: Equipment

keywords.description: Bonus if this is NOT the first card you play in a round.
keywords.name: Nightfall

keywords.description: When I'm summoned, refill 1 spell mana.
keywords.name: Attune

keywords.description: Bonus if this is the FIRST card you play in a round.
keywords.name: Daybreak

keywords.description: Can block Elusive units
keywords.name: Blocks Elusive

keywords.description: Missing Translation
keywords.name: Missing Translation

keywords.description: A unit's spell-like effect that allows enemy reactions.
keywords.name: Skill

keywords.description: A card triggers its plunder ability when played if you damaged the enemy Nexus this round.
keywords.name: Plunder

keywords.description: While attacking, it strikes both before AND at the same time as its blocker.
keywords.name: Double Attack

keywords.description: The enemy can challenge this unit, forcing it to block.
keywords.name: Vulnerable

keywords.description: Can only be blocked by an Elusive unit.
keywords.name: Elusive

keywords.description: Remove a unit from combat. It can't attack or block for the rest of the round.
keywords.name: Stun

keywords.description: Each round, the first time an allied card targets me, grant me +1|+1.
keywords.name: Fated

keywords.description: When I kill a unit, grant me +1|+1.
keywords.name: Fury

keywords.description: Negates the next damage the unit would take. Lasts one round.
keywords.name: Barrier

keywords.description: Can't attack or block.
keywords.name: Immobile

keywords.description: After I die, for the rest of the game when allies attack, hallow your first attacker giving it +1|+0 that round
keywords.name: Hallowed

keywords.description: I have +2|+2 once you've had Units with 6+ other unique positive keywords in play this game.
keywords.name: Evolve

keywords.description: Set a unit's Power to 0 this round. It can be changed after.
keywords.name: Frostbite

keywords.description: Excess damage I deal to my blocker is dealt to the enemy Nexus.
keywords.name: Overwhelm

keywords.description: While attacking, strikes before its blocker.
keywords.name: Quick Attack

keywords.description: Takes 1 less damage from all sources.
keywords.name: Tough

keywords.description: Heals fully at the end of each round.
keywords.name: Regeneration

keywords.description: Removes all text and keywords from a unit.
keywords.name: Silenced

keywords.description: Negates the next enemy spell or skill that would affect me.
keywords.name: SpellShield

keywords.description: Damage this unit deals heals its Nexus that amount.
keywords.name: Lifesteal

keywords.description: When you play a created card, grant me +1|+0.
keywords.name: Augment

keywords.description: When this strikes while attacking, it deals 1 to the enemy Nexus. This keyword can stack.
keywords.name: Impact

keywords.description: The first time only Scout units attack each round, ready your attack.
keywords.name: Scout

keywords.description: This unit dies when it strikes or when the round ends.
keywords.name: Ephemeral

keywords.description: When you attack while I'm on top of your deck, I Lurk, granting Lurker allies everywhere +1|+0. Max once per round.
keywords.name: Lurk

keywords.description: I strike with my Health instead of my Power.
keywords.name: Formidable

keywords.description: Can only be blocked by enemies with 3 or more Health.
keywords.name: Brash

keywords.description: Can choose which enemy unit blocks.
keywords.name: Challenger

keywords.description: Can only be blocked by enemies with 3 or more Power.
keywords.name: Fearsome
